scripts.opensea:listings: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- tsx src/opensea-listings.ts || tsx src/opensea-listings.ts'
scripts.revalidate: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- tsx src/revalidate-pages.ts || tsx src/revalidate-pages.ts'
scripts.debug:annotate: sh -ac '[ -f ../../.env.local ] && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- tsx src/debug-annotate.ts || tsx src/debug-annotate.ts'
